thread.title: Small U.K. Banks Show Big Rivals How To Travel Light
thread.title_full: Small U.K. Banks Show Big Rivals How To Travel Light - WSJ

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Small U.K. Banks Show Big Rivals How To Travel Light
text:
Picture a life without the baggage of the past. In the U.K., smaller banks are showing established rivals how that could be.
Take OneSavings Bank, built out of a small building society by financial investor J.C. Flowers & Co. and listed last year. It saw strong first-half lending growth and a stunningly low cost-to-income ratio of 26%,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
